20101218020539.571|20101218020541.000|CCO|INCLUDING HOYER, WERE ANGERED BY

20101218020759.333|20101218020801.000|CCO|MADDOFF?
20101218020801.000|20101218020803.000|CCO|>> WELL, THE LATE JEFFREY
20101218020803.000|20101218020805.000|CCO|PICKHAUER, HE DIED
20101218020805.000|20101218020807.000|CCO|A-- OCTOBER A YEAR AGO, WAS
20101218020807.000|20101218020809.000|CCO|PROBABLY ONE OF THE QUIETEST,
20101218020809.000|20101218020811.000|CCO|RICHEST MEN IN AMERICA.
20101218020811.000|20101218020813.500|CCO|'S SELLABLED AN ENORMOUS
20101218020813.500|20101218020816.000|CCO|WEALTH BY ONE ESTIMATE HE
20101218020816.000|20101218020818.500|CCO|HAD $10 BILLION IN ONE
20101218020818.500|20101218020821.000|CCO|TRADING ACCOUNT AT GOLDMAN
20101218020821.000|20101218020823.000|CCO|SACHS IN THE 1990s.
20101218020823.000|20101218020825.000|CCO|AND TRADED ELSEWHERE.
20101218020825.000|20101218020827.000|CCO|HE TRADED LEGITIMATELY IN
20101218020827.000|20101218020829.000|CCO|PUBLICLY TRADED STOCKS.
20101218020829.000|20101218020831.000|CCO|HE ENGAGED IN MERGERS AND
20101218020831.000|20101218020833.000|CCO|ACQUISITIONS, SPECULATION
20101218020833.000|20101218020835.000|CCO|AND ACCUMULATED VERY, VERY
20101218020835.000|20101218020837.000|CCO|QUIETLY THIS ENORMOUS SUM.
20101218020837.000|20101218020839.000|CCO|HE ALSO INVESTED WITH BERNIE
20101218020839.000|20101218020841.000|CCO|MADDOFF AND IS IS THAT MONEY
20101218020841.000|20101218020842.429|CCO|THAT IS BEING RETURNED NOW

20101218022221.000|20101218022223.000|CCO|VAST FORTH PAKISTANIES TO
20101218022223.000|20101218022225.000|CCO|LAUNCH ANY MAJOR

20101218022227.000|20101218022229.000|CCO|>> Warner: DO YOU THINK THE
20101218022229.000|20101218022231.000|CCO|U.S. CAN ACHIEVE SUCCESS IN

20101218022936.000|20101218022938.500|CCO|NATIONALITY OF PEOPLE WHO
20101218022938.500|20101218022941.000|CCO|WERE BORN IN THE 1940s.
20101218022941.000|20101218022943.000|CCO|>> SOME OF THESE PEOPLE HAVE
